thread.title: Quiz: How Many Of These Boasts Have You Made After Only 15 Minutes Of Ice Fishing?
thread.title_full: Quiz: How Many Of These Boasts Have You Made After Only 15 Minutes Of Ice Fishing?

title: Quiz: How Many Of These Boasts Have You Made After Only 15 Minutes Of Ice Fishing?
text: 1. Check off all the boasts you have made: “Sitting near an ice hole is easy as shit to me.” “Fifteen minutes in and not once have I been outwitted by a clever salmon. Yeah, it’s pretty cool, I guess.” “For these fish, being caught by me is a rite of passage akin to getting one’s driver’s license.” “In 45 minutes, any fish I catch will be an hour bigger and wiser than it was before I got here, and that will not pose any problems for a fisherman like me.” “I bet Ben Affleck would enjoy watching me do this.” “I’m not even the slightest bit tired of fish or ice yet.” “I parked my car closer to the pond than you can even comprehend.” “I’m what they call ‘the dead-fish woman.’” “I came here from the gym.” “Fish come from all over to get caught by me in this lake.” “I have done murder here tonight, heinous murder.” “I have mastered this activity and would now like to leave.” Get results Results for How Many Of These Boasts Have You Made After Only 15 Minutes Of Ice Fishing? You’ve Made A Whole Lot Of Boasts After Only 15 Minutes Of Ice Fishing! Whoa there. You talk a heck of a big ice-fishing game for someone who’s only been ice fishing for 15 minutes. Bet you think you’re a natural at this. Well, talk is cheap. How about you stick it out on the lake a while longer, and we'll see if you’ve changed your tune after 35 minutes or so of ice fishing. Share Your Results Results for How Many Of These Boasts Have You Made After Only 15 Minutes Of Ice Fishing? You’ve Made A Few Boasts After Only 15 Minutes Of Ice Fishing. All right! After just 15 minutes, you’re feeling good enough about ice fishing to get in a little trash talk about who’s the new big name in ice fishing, to the tune of several wild boasts about your ice-fishing prowess.That’s the spirit! Share Your Results Results for How Many Of These Boasts Have You Made After Only 15 Minutes Of Ice Fishing? You’ve Barely Made Any Boasts After Just 15 Minutes Of Ice Fishing. Look, we get it. It’s only been 15 minutes, you’re unsure about your ice-fishing mastery, and you don’t want to speak out of turn. That's a noble instinct, but have some confidence! Show your pride. One or two outrageous boasts wouldn’t hurt anyone. Go ahead. Shout something out like, “Written accounts of my prowess on the ice will outlive human civilization!” Who knows? It might even be true. Share Your Results
